Raila Odinga said Gbagbo had broken several promises that he had made to lift a blockade put in place around the Abidjan hotel where Alassane Ouattara is confined. Mr. Gbagbo gave me an assurance that this blockade would be lifted yesterday, but he broke that promise- for the second time in two weeks, Raila Odinga said. Pro-Gbagbo forces have been accused of targeting Alassane Ouattara 's supporters in the commercial hub of Abidjan, and supporters of both candidates have taken to the streets in protest.
